Getting Around
main entrance to the building will not be accessible from 8 pm during weekdays and from 7 pm on Saturdays . students are required to enter NUS-ISS building from the main entrance .
a complimentary shuttle bus service is available for NUS staff and students . alight opposite Hon Sui Sen Memorial Library (OPP HSSML)

students are strongly encouraged to be at the pickup point at least 5 minutes prior to the stated time to avoid missing the bus . shuttle service to and fro NUS-ISS Campus Dover MRT Station (Exit A) $1.00

MTech Programmes Requirements

Capstone Project To attain a degree IS degree typically comprises 52 – 53 modular credits from: 1. Fundamental GCs • Intelligent Reasoning Systems • Pattern Recognition Systems 2. Specialist (2 out of 4 GC) • Intelligent Sensing Systems

student must achieve a final CAP of at least 3.00 in the attempted Graduate Certificate . if failed, students are subject to the following academic standing rules: Status Rules Warning CAP below 3.00 ( 2.50)
Failing to achieve the required attendance, students will have to retake the modular course . temporary suspension of studies may be granted for a semester to max 4 semesters .

students are required to expressly declare having read, understood, and agreed to abide by the following policies . students must sign to the following Authorisation Requirements: Risk Acknowledgement and Consent .

MTech in Intelligent Systems (2019) is a master's degree programme at the National University of Singapore (nus) he is currently the director of graduate programmes at the institute of systems science . he has published a bunch of papers, has a few patents and has been an invited speaker in more than a dozen international events .
